And it shall <S%H1961>be,<s%> when he lieth <S%H7901>down,<s%> that thou shalt <S%H3045>mark<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> he shall <S%H7901>lie,<s%> and thou shalt go <S%H935>in,<s%> and <S%H1540>uncover<s%> his <S%H4772>feet,<s%> and lay thee <S%H7901>down;<s%> and <S%H1931>he<s%> will <S%H5046>tell<s%> <S%H853>thee<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> thou shalt <S%H6213>do.<s%>
And she <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> her, <S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> thou <S%H559>sayest<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me I will <S%H6213>do.<s%>
And she went <S%H3381>down<s%> unto the <S%H1637>floor,<s%> and <S%H6213>did<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> her <S%H2545>mother-in-law<s%> <S%H6680>bade<s%> her.

And when <S%H1162>Boaz<s%> had <S%H398>eaten<s%> and <S%H8354>drunk,<s%> and his <S%H3820>heart<s%> was <S%H3190>merry,<s%> he <S%H935>went<s%> to lie <S%H7901>down<s%> at the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the heap of <S%H6194>corn:<s%> and she <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H3909>softly,<s%> and <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> his <S%H4772>feet,<s%> and laid her <S%H7901>down.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> at <S%H2677>midnight,<s%> <S%H3915><s%> that the <S%H376>man<s%> was <S%H2729>afraid,<s%> and turned <S%H3943>himself:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H7901>lay<s%> at his <S%H4772>feet.<s%>

And <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H3588><s%> it is <S%H551>true<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H595>I<s%> am thy near <S%H1350>kinsman:<s%> <S%H1571>howbeit<s%> there <S%H3426>is<s%> a <S%H1350>kinsman<s%> <S%H7138>nearer<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> I.

Tarry <S%H3885><s%> this <S%H3915>night,<s%> and it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> that <S%H518>if<s%> he will perform unto thee the part of a <S%H1350>kinsman,<s%> <S%H2896>well;<s%> let him do the kinsman's <S%H1350>part:<s%> but <S%H518>if<s%> he <S%H2654>will<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> do the part of a <S%H1350>kinsman<s%> to thee, then will <S%H595>I<s%> do the part of a <S%H1350>kinsman<s%> to thee, as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>liveth:<s%> lie <S%H7901>down<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H1242>morning.<s%>

And she <S%H7901>lay<s%> at his <S%H4772>feet<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H1242>morning:<s%> and she rose <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H2958>before<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> could <S%H5234>know<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7453>another.<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> Let it <S%H408>not<s%> be <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H1637>floor.<s%>

Also he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3051>Bring<s%> the <S%H4304>veil<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> thou hast <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee, and <S%H270>hold<s%> it. And when she <S%H270>held<s%> it, he <S%H4058>measured<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> measures of <S%H8184>barley,<s%> and <S%H7896>laid<s%> it <S%H5921>on<s%> her: and she went <S%H935>into<s%> the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

And when she <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> her <S%H2545>mother-in-law,<s%> she <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> art <S%H859>thou,<s%> my <S%H1323>daughter?<s%> And she <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H853>her<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> to her.

And she <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> measures of <S%H8184>barley<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> he me; <S%H3588>for<s%> he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> me, <S%H935>Go<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H7387>empty<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thy <S%H2545>mother-in-law.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> she, Sit <S%H3427>still,<s%> my <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H834><s%> thou <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H349>how<s%> the <S%H1697>matter<s%> will <S%H5307>fall:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> will <S%H3808>not<s%> be in <S%H8252>rest,<s%> <S%H3588>until<s%> <S%H518><s%> he have <S%H3615>finished<s%> the <S%H1697>thing<s%> this <S%H3117>day.<s%>
